languages.text: {n}Быстрое движение, блеск холодной иглы у шеи Мариуса, и глаза медикария закатываются, а тело сводит судорогой. Долгие секунды ничего не происходит, а затем он выдавливает:{/n} "О, Император! Какая мерзость, какое невыносимое, тронопротивное богохульство!" {n}Он стискивает зубы и сквозь выступившую пену упрямо бормочет.{/n} "И не убоюсь я скверны, и приму я смерть как верный слуга Его!"

{n}One swift movement, and a cold needle flashes by Marius's neck. His eyes roll up and his body convulses. Nothing happens for several long seconds, until he finally forces out,{/n} "O Emperor! What an abomination, what unbearable, Throne-offending blasphemy!" {n}He clenches his teeth and mutters stubbornly on through the froth forming on his lips.{/n} "And I shall fear no corruption, and I shall face my death as His faithful servant!"
languages.original_text: {n}Быстрое движение, блеск холодной иглы у шеи Мариуса, и глаза медикария закатываются, а тело сводит судорогой. Долгие секунды ничего не происходит, а затем он выдавливает:{/n} "О, Император! Какая мерзость, какое невыносимое, тронопротивное богохульство!" {n}Он стискивает зубы и сквозь выступившую пену упрямо бормочет.{/n} "И не убоюсь я скверны, и приму я смерть как верный слуга Его!"

traits.locale_text: {n}In a swift movement, a cold needle flashes next to Marius's neck. The medicae officer's eyes roll up, and his body is convulsed. Seconds drag on with nothing happening, until he squeezes out,{/n} "O Emperor! What an abomination, what unbearable, unthronely blasphemy!" {n}He clenches his teeth and mutters stubbornly on through the froth on his lips.{/n} "And I shall fear no corruption, and I shall face my death as His faithful servant!"

What an abomination, what unbearable, Throne-offending blasphemy!" {n}He clenches his teeth and mutters stubbornly on through the froth forming on his lips.{/n} "And I shall fear no corruption, and I shall face my death as His faithful servant!"

languages.text: {n}Elle fait un geste rapide qui laisse à peine le temps d'apercevoir l'éclat d'une aiguille sur le cou de Marius. Les yeux de l'officier se révulsent et son corps est pris de convulsions. Au bout d'un moment qui semble s'éterniser, il finit par s'écrier :{/n} « Ô Empereur ! Quelle abomination ! C'est un affront au Trône, un blasphème intolérable ! » {n}Il serre les dents et continue obstinément à marmonner à travers l'écume qui se forme sur ses lèvres.{/n} « J'affronterai la corruption sans faillir et je ferai face à ma mort en tant que fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur ! »
languages.original_text: {n}One swift movement, and a cold needle flashes by Marius's neck. His eyes roll up and his body convulses. Nothing happens for several long seconds, until he finally forces out,{/n} "O Emperor! What an abomination, what unbearable, Throne-offending blasphemy!" {n}He clenches his teeth and mutters stubbornly on through the froth forming on his lips.{/n} "And I shall fear no corruption, and I shall face my death as His faithful servant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle fait un geste rapide qui laisse à peine le temps d'apercevoir l'éclat d'une aiguille sur le cou de Marius. Les yeux de l'officier se révulsent et son corps est pris de convulsions. Au bout d'un moment qui semble s'éterniser, il finit par s'écrier :{/n} « Ô Empereur ! Quelle abomination ! C'est un affront au Trône, un blasphème intolérable ! » {n}Il serre les dents et continue obstinément à marmonner à travers l'écume qui se forme sur ses lèvres.{/n} « J'affronterai la corruption sans faillir et je ferai face à ma mort en tant que fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur ! »

languages.text: {n}Una fría aguja entra y sale del cuello de Marius con una rapidez fulgurante. El oficial pone los ojos en blanco y su cuerpo se convulsiona. Nada ocurre durante unos segundos que parecen eternos, hasta que finalmente Marius exclama:{/n} «¡Oh, Emperador! ¡Qué abominación, qué blasfemia tan insoportable, qué afrenta al Trono!». {n}Aprieta los dientes y masculla obstinadamente a través de los espumarajos que se forman en sus labios.{/n} «¡Y no temeré corrupción alguna, y afrontaré la muerte como Su fiel servidor!».
languages.original_text: {n}One swift movement, and a cold needle flashes by Marius's neck. His eyes roll up and his body convulses. Nothing happens for several long seconds, until he finally forces out,{/n} "O Emperor! What an abomination, what unbearable, Throne-offending blasphemy!" {n}He clenches his teeth and mutters stubbornly on through the froth forming on his lips.{/n} "And I shall fear no corruption, and I shall face my death as His faithful servant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una fría aguja entra y sale del cuello de Marius con una rapidez fulgurante. El oficial pone los ojos en blanco y su cuerpo se convulsiona. Nada ocurre durante unos segundos que parecen eternos, hasta que finalmente Marius exclama:{/n} «¡Oh, Emperador! ¡Qué abominación, qué blasfemia tan insoportable, qué afrenta al Trono!». {n}Aprieta los dientes y masculla obstinadamente a través de los espumarajos que se forman en sus labios.{/n} «¡Y no temeré corrupción alguna, y afrontaré la muerte como Su fiel servidor!».

languages.text: {n}伴着无比迅捷的动作，一根冰冷的尖针在马吕斯的脖子上闪过。他翻着白眼白眼，全身抽搐。几秒钟过去了，什么都没有发生。到最后，他终于硬撑着，开了口。{/n}“噢，帝皇在上！这是对黄金王座的亵渎！多么可恶、多么令人无法忍受的恶行！”{n}他咬紧牙关，不顾嘴角吐出的白沫，固执地喃喃自语着。{/n}“我绝不惧怕腐化，我将以帝皇忠仆的身份面对死亡！”
languages.original_text: {n}One swift movement, and a cold needle flashes by Marius's neck. His eyes roll up and his body convulses. Nothing happens for several long seconds, until he finally forces out,{/n} "O Emperor! What an abomination, what unbearable, Throne-offending blasphemy!" {n}He clenches his teeth and mutters stubbornly on through the froth forming on his lips.{/n} "And I shall fear no corruption, and I shall face my death as His faithful servant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伴着无比迅捷的动作，一根冰冷的尖针在马吕斯的脖子上闪过。他翻着白眼白眼，全身抽搐。几秒钟过去了，什么都没有发生。到最后，他终于硬撑着，开了口。{/n}“噢，帝皇在上！这是对黄金王座的亵渎！多么可恶、多么令人无法忍受的恶行！”{n}他咬紧牙关，不顾嘴角吐出的白沫，固执地喃喃自语着。{/n}“我绝不惧怕腐化，我将以帝皇忠仆的身份面对死亡！”

languages.text: {n}マリウスの首に寒気が走った。彼は目を丸くし、身体をこわばらせた。数秒の間何も起きなかったが、突然彼は喋り始めた。{/n}「あぁ、皇帝！なんという醜態、なんという耐えがたい、王座を冒涜する行為だろう！」{n}彼は歯をガタガタと震わせ、唇に泡を立てながら、頑固につぶやいた。{/n}「私は腐敗を恐れない。主の従順な僕として、死を受け入れます！」
languages.original_text: {n}One swift movement, and a cold needle flashes by Marius's neck. His eyes roll up and his body convulses. Nothing happens for several long seconds, until he finally forces out,{/n} "O Emperor! What an abomination, what unbearable, Throne-offending blasphemy!" {n}He clenches his teeth and mutters stubbornly on through the froth forming on his lips.{/n} "And I shall fear no corruption, and I shall face my death as His faithful servant!"

traits.locale_text: {n}マリウスの首に寒気が走った。彼は目を丸くし、身体をこわばらせた。数秒の間何も起きなかったが、突然彼は喋り始めた。{/n}「あぁ、皇帝！なんという醜態、なんという耐えがたい、王座を冒涜する行為だろう！」{n}彼は歯をガタガタと震わせ、唇に泡を立てながら、頑固につぶやいた。{/n}「私は腐敗を恐れない。主の従順な僕として、死を受け入れます！」

languages.text: {n}Eine schnelle Bewegung, und eine kalte Nadel blitzt neben Marius' Hals auf. Seine Augen rollen nach oben und sein Körper zuckt. Einige lange Sekunden lang geschieht nichts, dann presst er schließlich hervor:{/n} "O Imperator! Welch Abscheulichkeit, welch unerträgliche, thron-lästernde Blasphemie!" {n}Er beißt die Zähne zusammen und murmelt durch den Schaum, der sich auf seinen Lippen bildet, stur weiter:{/n} "Und ich fürchte keine Verderbnis und ich trete meinem Tod als sein treuer Diener entgegen!"
languages.original_text: {n}One swift movement, and a cold needle flashes by Marius's neck. His eyes roll up and his body convulses. Nothing happens for several long seconds, until he finally forces out,{/n} "O Emperor! What an abomination, what unbearable, Throne-offending blasphemy!" {n}He clenches his teeth and mutters stubbornly on through the froth forming on his lips.{/n} "And I shall fear no corruption, and I shall face my death as His faithful servant!"

Einige lange Sekunden lang geschieht nichts, dann presst er schließlich hervor:{/n} "O Imperator! Welch Abscheulichkeit, welch unerträgliche, thron-lästernde Blasphemie!" {n}Er beißt die Zähne zusammen und murmelt durch den Schaum, der sich auf seinen Lippen bildet, stur weiter:{/n} "Und ich fürchte keine Verderbnis und ich trete meinem Tod als sein treuer Diener entgegen!"

languages.text: {n}Soğuk bir iğne atik bir hareketle Marius'un boynundan geçiyor. Gözlerinin akı ortaya çıkıyor ve bedeni kasılmaya başlıyor. Birkaç uzun saniye boyunca hiçbir şey olmuyor, ardından haykırmaya başlıyor.{/n} "İmparator'um! Bu ne canavarlık! Bu Taht'a karşı ne dayanılmaz bir kâfirlik!" {n}Dişlerini sıkıyor ve dudaklarında biriken köpüklerin arasından inatla mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Ve ben yozlaşma nedir bilmeyeceğim! Ve ben ölümümle O'nun inançlı hizmetkârı olarak yüzleşeceğim!"
languages.original_text: {n}One swift movement, and a cold needle flashes by Marius's neck. His eyes roll up and his body convulses. Nothing happens for several long seconds, until he finally forces out,{/n} "O Emperor! What an abomination, what unbearable, Throne-offending blasphemy!" {n}He clenches his teeth and mutters stubbornly on through the froth forming on his lips.{/n} "And I shall fear no corruption, and I shall face my death as His faithful servant!"
